timeline.message:
Allow injecting a function which retrieves Mime Types
from server to component 'MimeTypeFilterEditingDialog'.

timeline.bodyText: You'll note in the other injections of supplier functions, that we've set a default supplier on the component when deconstructing the props. That way you don't need to specify this here, only when you're doing tests/storybooks.
timeline.author: edalex-ian

timeline.message:
Give component MimeTypeFilterEditingDialog a default
Mime Type supplier.
